tool_description: Cheapest Podcast API. Search episodes and podcasts. Directory, feeds, typeahead, trending...
name: Podcast API
title: Podcast API

api_list.name: feed_channel
api_list.description: Get episode IDs and release date from one or more channels

api_list.name: categories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://podcast-api1.p.rapidapi.com/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "podcast-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://podcast-api1.p.rapidapi.com/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "podcast-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: top_channels
api_list.description: Gte the most popular channels by category

api_list.name: typeahead
episode
api_list.description: Get information about an individual episode

api_list.name: channel
search_channel
feed_episode
api_list.description: Get all episodes of a channel

optional_parameters.name: eids
optional_parameters.description: Select only specific episode IDs. Separate by commas

api_list.name: search_episode
api_list.description: Search episodes in all channels or in an individual channel

optional_parameters.name: cid
optional_parameters.description: Channel ID. Search episodes in this channel.
